animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears, and I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: I am often found in the jungle.
I am the largest land animal.
I use my nose to drink water.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. Who am I?

hints.text: I love to play with string.
I like to drink milk.
I come in many colors.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I'm often called man's best friend. Who am I?

hints.text: I love to chew on bones.
I go for walks with my owner.
I can be trained to do tricks.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the water. What am I?

hints.text: I like to eat bread.
I lay eggs.
I have webbed feet.

animal.question: I roar and am the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: I have a mane.
I am a carnivore.
I am a big cat.

animal.question: I hop and carry my babies in a pouch. Who am I?

hints.text: I am from Australia.
I have strong legs.
I eat eucalyptus leaves.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. Who am I?

hints.text: My stripes are unique like fingerprints.
I eat grass.
I look like a horse.

animal.question: I slither and hiss, and some of me are venomous. Who am I?

hints.text: I shed my skin.
I eat mice.
Some types of me can be deadly.

animal.question: I build dams and have large teeth. I am an industrious rodent. Who am I?

hints.text: I gnaw on trees.
I live in lodges.
I can hold my breath underwater for a long time.

animal.question: I am a flightless bird that lives in a cold, icy environment and waddle when I walk. Who am I?

hints.text: I love the cold!
My diet consist mostly of fish.
